description: Tonight, we're serving up a double-dose of our latest hot recruit, Spencer.This was his two very first solo videos for us and I knew right from the beginning that Spencer was going to be one of those horny young troops that would go on to give us his all. Our latest release, Rear Admiral, was meant to showcase his talents in the two scenes on the DVD. Now, you get to see his very first work here at Active Duty and see just how far he's come so quickly.I'm personally crazy about this one. Those blue eyes and that rock hard cock that never seems to go down just drive me crazy.
title: Spencer, Scene #01
